mutants.code:
def calculate_min_steps(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case[0]
        A = case[1]
        z = [0] / 100
        k = 1
        c = 0
        for i in A:
            if i == 0:
                z.insert(0, k)
            else:
                m = z.index(i)
                n = m + 1
                p = len(z) - z.count(0) - n
                c += min(n, p)
                z.insert(m + 1, k)
            k += 1
        results.append(c)
    return results

            if i == 0:
                z.insert(0, k)
            else:
                m = z.index(i)
                n = m + 0
                p = len(z) - z.count(0) - n
                c += min(n, p)
                z.insert(m + 1, k)
            k += 1
        results.append(c)
    return results

def calculate_min_steps(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case[0]
        A = case[1]
        z = [0] * 100
        k = 1
        c = 0
        for i in A:
            if i == 0:
                z.insert(0, k)
            else:
                m = z.index(i)
                n = m + -1
                p = len(z) - z.count(0) - n
                c += min(n, p)
                z.insert(m + 1, k)
            k += 1
        results.append(c)
    return results
